user_query: I want to plan a surprise birthday party for my sister and send invitations to all our contacts on WhatsApp.

TaskList.description: Compile a list of all contacts who will be invited to the birthday party.
required_inputs: contact list from phone or application

TaskList.description: Draft a message for the birthday party invitation.
required_inputs: party details like date, time, location

TaskList.description: Use the 'Kirim Pesan' API to send WhatsApp invitations to all compiled contacts with the drafted message.
